8 #include <rktl_perception/focus_vis.h>
9 
10 namespace rktl_perception {
11 
12 FocusVis::FocusVis(const ros::NodeHandle& nh) : _nh(nh), _it(_nh) {
13  _imgPub = _it.advertise("edge_dectection", 1);
14  _cameraSub = _it.subscribeCamera("image_rect_color", 10, &FocusVis::focusCallback, this);
15 }
16 
17 void FocusVis::focusCallback(const sensor_msgs::ImageConstPtr& msg,
18  const sensor_msgs::CameraInfoConstPtr& info) {
19  try {
20  /* Convert the ROS message into a cv_ptr & dereferencing the pointer to an OpenCV Mat */
21  cv_bridge::CvImagePtr cv_ptr = cv_bridge::toCvCopy(msg, "bgr8");
22  cv::Mat current_frame = cv_ptr->image;
23  cv::Mat frame_gray, frame_blurred, frame_edge;
24 
25  /* Convert from BGR to grey scale colorspace */
26  cvtColor(current_frame, frame_gray, cv::COLOR_BGR2GRAY);
27 
28  cv::GaussianBlur(frame_gray, frame_blurred, cv::Size(5, 5), 1.5);
29 
30  cv::Canny(frame_blurred, frame_edge, 100, 200);
31  /* publishes the threshold image */
32 
33  sensor_msgs::Image edgeImg;
34  std_msgs::Header header;
35  cv_bridge::CvImage img_bridge;
36  header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
37  img_bridge = cv_bridge::CvImage(header, sensor_msgs::image_encodings::MONO8, frame_edge);
38  img_bridge.toImageMsg(edgeImg);
39  _imgPub.publish(edgeImg);
40 
41  } catch (cv_bridge::Exception& e) {
42  ROS_ERROR("There was some error, likely with image conversion");
43  }
44 }
45 
46 } // namespace rktl_perception
